item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: M/cycle area constantly boxed in, 19th December
item.description:
Ironically, constantly boxed in by whoever was mad enough to paint a box overlapping each side of the M/cycle area. Like today, clearly white van 'person' must have known they were going to box in several solos but couldn't give a s**t. Welling High Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: S/lights not working in Cross Way T'Mead, 19th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London

item.title: Berries fallen off tree, 19th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brixham Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Directly in front of the property entrance at 8 Prince Albert Road, NW1 7SRThe drain is blocked, causing water to pool in front of the house, making it difficult and unsafe to leave., 19th December
item.description:
Hello, I have previously reported a persistent water pooling/flooding issue on the street directly in front of my home. This problem causes difficulty and hazard when exiting my property. Despite raising this with Camden Council, the issue has not been resolved and continues to disrupt daily life. I have attached new photos showing the current situation. I request urgent action and a response detailing what will be done to fix this. Thank you,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Outer Circle, Chalk Farm, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
